metadata.title: C++ Serbia
metadata.description: Join the growing community of C++ developers in Serbia. Discover events, meetups, workshops, and connect with fellow developers.
metadata.ogDescription: Join the growing community of C++ developers in Serbia. Discover events, meetups, workshops, and connect with fellow developers.

hero.title: C++ Serbia
hero.subtitle: The C++ community in Serbia. Talks, workshops, and meetups for developers who want to learn and share knowledge.

about.title: About Our Community
about.paragraph1: C++ Serbia brings together C++ developers from across Serbia. We organize talks, workshops, and meetups focused on modern C++ and software development.
about.paragraph2: Our goal is to create a space where developers can learn from each other, share practical knowledge, and stay current with the language.
about.paragraph3: Whether you write C++ every day or are just curious about it — you're welcome here.

featuredEvents.title: Featured Events
featuredEvents.subtitle: Join us at our next meetups and workshops
featuredEvents.empty: No featured events at the moment. Check back soon!

joinSection.title: Join Our Community
joinSection.subtitle: Connect with us on these platforms
joinSection.learnDescription: Attend talks, workshops, and discussions on modern C++ and software development
joinSection.networkDescription: Meet other C++ developers, share experiences, and learn from each other
joinSection.contributeDescription: Share what you know and help grow the C++ community in Serbia

eventsPage.title: Events - C++ Serbia
eventsPage.description: Join C++ Serbia events! Discover upcoming meetups, workshops, and conferences for C++ developers in Serbia.
eventsPage.heading: Events
eventsPage.subtitle: Stay up to date with all C++ Serbia events, meetups, workshops, and conferences.
eventsPage.emptyUpcoming: No upcoming events scheduled yet! Just in case, save the date for the last Wednesday of the month.
eventsPage.subscribeFeed: Subscribe to our feeds to get updates on our future events

footer.description: A community of C++ developers in Serbia, sharing knowledge and promoting best practices.
footer.contactQuestion: Have questions or want to get involved?

seo.organizationDescription: C++ Serbia is a vibrant community of C++ developers in Serbia, organizing meetups, workshops, and conferences to promote knowledge sharing and networking among C++ enthusiasts.
